comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: SCAM!I don't know, do you want to ask honestly or do you really want to spread phishing sites on forums pretending you don't know. hmmDo not click on the site above directing you to connect to Metamask

comments.author: OmegaStarScream
comments.body: With that domain name, the lack of an SSL certification, and MetaMask popping up as soon as I visit the site? I doubt it. and I hope you didn't authorize anything with your wallet otherwise your funds are probably at risk.
